practices.title: Team kick-off
practices.why: To set a team up for success, identify purpose and build relationships.
practices.how: Done for all teams when they’re first established or when new people join an existing team.

practices.title: User stories and epics
practices.why: Ensures the user remains our core focus, explains why we do a piece of work.
practices.how: Tend to use ‘As a’, ‘I want’, ‘So that’ format for stories. Articulate the problem & business needs but the team define the solution.

practices.title: Sign up/Team empowerment
practices.why: Empower people, and try to promote autonomy, mastery and purpose in team members.
practices.how: Priority of work is determined by POs, Teams decide on how best to deliver the outcome.
